tool_description: The fastest, easiest, and most affordable way to get Instagram data.
name: Instagram Scraper 2024
title: Instagram Scraper 2024

api_list.name: Get Highlight Data
Get Story Data
api_list.description:
Get single-story data. Make sure the story is public. This endpoint doesn't support private accounts.
`userId` or `username` and the `storyId` are required.

api_list.name: Get Location Data
api_list.description:
Get location data. Response contains: Reels, posts, accounts found in a location.

`locationId` is required.
`nextMaxId` is used for pagination.

api_list.name: Get Post Likers
api_list.description:
Get post likers data.

The post's `shortcode` or `postId` is required.

api_list.name: Get Post Comments
api_list.description:
Get post comments data.
The post's `shortcode` or `postId` is required.

`cachedCommentsCursor` and `bifilterToken` are used for pagination.

api_list.name: Get Post / Reel / IGTV / Video / Image Data
api_list.description:
Get data for: posts, reels, IGTV, videos, images, etc...
the Post's `shortcode` or `postId` is required.

api_list.name: Get User Followers
api_list.description:
Get user followers data. `username` or `userId` is required.

optional params:
`pageSize` : sets the number of posts to return at a time. The default is 12.
`maxId` : used for pagination. You get it from a previous response

api_list.name: Get User Tagged
api_list.description:
Get user tagged posts. `username` or userId` is required.

optional params:
`pageSize` : sets the number of posts to return at a time. The default is 12.
`endCursor` : used for pagination. You get it from a previous response

api_list.name: Get User Highlights Tray
api_list.description: Get the user highlights tray.  `username` or userId` is required.

api_list.name: Get User Stories
api_list.description: Get user stories. `username` or userId` is required.

api_list.name: Get User Reels
api_list.description:
Get user reels. `username` or userId` is required.

optional params:
`pageSize` : sets the number of posts to return at a time.
`maxId` : used for pagination. You get it from a previous response

api_list.name: Get User Posts
api_list.description:
Get user posts. `username` or `userId` is required. 

optional params:
`pageSize` : sets the number of posts to return at a time. The default is 12.
`endCursor` : used for pagination. You get it from a previous response

api_list.name: Get User Info
api_list.description: Get user information  data.  A `username` or `userId` is required.
